repo.description: Powerful Tox chat client that follows the Tox design guidelines.

body: ```sh run-clang-tidy -p _build -fix \ $(find . -name "*.h" -or -name "*.cpp" -or -name "*.c" | grep -v "/_build/") \ -checks="-*,readability-implicit-bool-conversion"` ``` - - - This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/TokTok/qTox/77)

commit.message:
cleanup: Avoid implicit bool conversions.

```sh
run-clang-tidy -p _build -fix \
  $(find . -name "*.h" -or -name "*.cpp" -or -name "*.c" | grep -v "/_build/") \
  -checks="-*,readability-implicit-bool-conversion"`
```
